name: bottle-cap
effect: Trade to Mr. Hyper to set one of a Pokémon’s genes to 31.
short_effect: Trade to Mr. Hyper to maximize one of a Pokémon’s genes.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A beautiful bottle cap that gives off a silver gleam. Some people are happy to receive one.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A beautiful bottle cap that gives off a silver gleam. Some people are happy to receive one.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A beautiful bottle cap that gives off a silver gleam. Some people are happy to receive one.
